reStructuredText Primer
=======================

.. contents::
   :backlinks: none
   :local:
   
Again some very basic doc. hello again. Have a nice day!

.. index:: Headers

Headers
-------

To add a header, just write your title, and then underline it (or in
some cases, overline and underline) using one of the characters in the
list below. Underlines and overlines should have the same length as
the heading.

.. index:: Tables of Contents

Tables of Contents
------------------

To add a table of contents to link to other documents (such as sub-pages).

.. index:: Code Blocks

Code Blocks
-----------

This explains how to add code blocks
